title: tfoot
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The tfoot element defines a group of footer rows in a table.

usageExamples.title: Basic tfoot Example
usageExamples.description: Example showing the basic usage of the tfoot element.
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/table
	/thead
		/tr
			/th
				Header 1
			/th
				Header 2
	/tfoot
		/tr
			/td
				Footer 1
			/td
				Footer 2
	/tbody
		/tr
			/td
				Data 1
			/td
				Data 2
